Uses of Class
com.google.publicalerts.cap.Reasons

  • Packages that use Reasons 
    Package Description
    com.google.publicalerts.cap
    This package contains the core classes that encode the CAP protocol as well as classes that can parse and write CAP messages from a variety of wire formats.
    com.google.publicalerts.cap.feed
    This package contains classes to parse and write feeds (Atom, RSS, and more) enclosing CAP messages.
    com.google.publicalerts.cap.profile
    This package contains classes that handle specific CAP profiles, which specify a set of extra constraints on the CAP format.
    com.google.publicalerts.cap.profile.au  
    com.google.publicalerts.cap.profile.ca  
    com.google.publicalerts.cap.profile.us

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Reasons Reasons.EMPTY  
      Methods in com.google.publicalerts.cap that return Reasons 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Reasons Reasons.Builder.build()
      Builds and returns the immutable collection.
      Reasons CapException.getReasons()  
      Reasons XercesCapExceptionMapper.map​(Reasons reasons)
      Attempts to map Reasons of type CapException.ReasonType.OTHER derived from Xerces-generated SAXParseExceptions to reasons with more descriptive CapException.ReasonTypes and error messages specific to CAP.
      static Reasons Reasons.of​(Reason... reasons)
      Creates a Reasons object with the content specified.
      Reasons Reasons.prefixWithXpath​(java.lang.String xPathPrefix)
      Builds a copy of this Reasons object, with the XPath prefixed with xPathPrefix.
      Reasons CapValidator.validateAlert​(AlertOrBuilder alert)
      Validates a CAP alert.

      Reasons CapProfile.validate​(AlertOrBuilder alert)
      Checks the given alert against the profile and returns a collection of: errors explaining how the alert does not match the profile, recommendations and best-practices recommended by the profile to improve the alert.
